duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a small team of 3 to 5 associates, monitoring workflow and ensuring departmental efficiency.
Resolve processing exceptions in a timely manner, document them, and communicate to appropriate parties.
Monitor compliance with controls and procedures, implement controls to eliminate losses.
Validate service expectations, communicate status, and establish areas for improvement.
Maintain effective working relationships with clients, other departments, trading areas, brokers, and service providers.
Assist with client presentations on derivatives operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent with business related coursework. At least 5 years’ related financial industry experience, part of which must be in management or supervisory capacity.
